map_grids.​ XPS_MG_fnc_hexGridSubCellMatrix
call XPS_MG_fnc_hexGridSubCellMatrix
Description

Calculates a 55 cell map of relative indexes which can be used to calculate sub cell indexes inside of a larger hex. This typically only needs to be done once and then stored somewhere for reference. The radius is predetermined at a value of 3 (three hexes in each of the 6 major directions to center of each flat edge of larger hex).

Authors

Crashdome

Parameter

<None>

Returns
<Array>
